data.text: @FrailSkeleton @Astrikos10 Yeah, there have been a few articles that show "science" that seem to indicate that masks may prevent a marginal amount of transmission. Never bothered to follow up on that but I agree that they don't do anything. That was the consensus before COVID anyway.
